name: AI Resume Builder
tagline: Create professional resumes in minutes with AI
description: AI Resume Builder is a cutting-edge tool that helps job seekers create professional, ATS-friendly resumes in minutes. Our AI analyzes your experience and suggests improvements, optimal keywords, and formatting that gets you noticed by recruiters. With dozens of professional templates, real-time editing, and export to PDF or Word, landing your dream job has never been easier. Whether you're a recent graduate or an experienced professional, our platform adapts to your needs and industry standards.
